resources.string: Are you diagnosed with dementia or any other memory loss condition?
Some thing Happens! Please check Again!
I agree that my registration information are collected, stored, and analyzed anonymously for research purposes

Translations of words in this app are based on the understanding that the translation is based carefully on the original English language version published by its prospective authors. The quality of the translation lies with the translator. However, as a way of checking the quality native speakers undertook back-translation. Users that use a translated version of this application and discover errors are encouraged to contact us at trungthaithanh170496@gmail.com

This app is for non-commercial use and is intended for research purposes into improving the quality of life for patients with dementia. By using this application, you acknowledge that your anonymised data may be included in the research study.
